    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La web de Lluís S@l@</string>
            <string language="en">Lluis S@l@'s webpage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lluis S@l@s Webseite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Page Web de Lluis S@l@</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web page de Lluis S@l@</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web page di Lluis S@l@</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Webpage του Lluis S@l@'s</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pàgina web personal d'un professor d'Educació Física de Primària. Posa a l'abast programacions, sessions, recursos i experiències dutes a terme al centre on ell treballa.</string>
            <string language="en">Personal webpage of a primary school physical education teacher, Lluís Sala. It includes programmes of study, sessions, resources and experiences carried out in the school where he works.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lloc Internet</string>
            <string language="en">Internet site</string>
            <string language="es">sitio Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació física</string>
            <string language="en">physical education</string>
            <string language="es">educación física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">habilitat</string>
            <string language="en">skill</string>
            <string language="es">habilidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">esport</string>
            <string language="en">sport</string>
            <string language="es">deporte</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Persönliche Webseite eines 
Leibeserziehunglehrers der Primärschule, Lluís Sala. Es 
schließt Programme der Studie, der Sitzungen, der Betriebsmittel und 
der Erfahrungen ein, die in der Schule durchgeführt werden, in der er
arbeitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Page Web personnelle d'un professeur 
d'éducation physique d'école primaire, Lluís Sala. Il inclut 
des programmes de l'étude, des sessions, des ressources et des 
expériences effectuées dans l'école où il travaille.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web page pessoal de um professor da instrução 
física de escola preliminar, Lluís Sala. Inclui programas do 
estudo, das sessões, dos recursos e das experiências realizados na 
escola onde trabalha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web page personale di un insegnante di formazione
fisica della scuola primaria, Lluís Sala. Include i programmi 
dello studio, delle sessioni, delle risorse e delle esperienze 
effettuati nella scuola in cui lavora.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσωπικό webpage ενός δασκάλου φυσικής αγωγής 
σχολείων πρωτοβάθμιας εκπαίδευσης, Lluνs Sala. 
Περιλαμβάνει τα προγράμματα της μελέτης, των περιόδων 
επικοινωνίας, των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς και της εμπειρίας που 
πραγματοποιούνται στο σχολείο όπου εργάζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Internet-Site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leibeserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fähigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Site Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compétence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sport</string>
          </keyword>
